findings.title: Revisited isMaxCapReached Logic in setMax()
findings.description: The update logic on parameters can be improved by applying more rigorous sanity checks. The `setMaxCap()` function needs to compare the current total deposited tokens to determine whether the cap is reached.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: The privileged `owner` account has the ability to control or govern the flow of assets managed by this protocol and can withdraw all funds from the contract.
